title: Technical Foundations

draft_attributes.title: What is the role of Quality Assurance Specialist? (multiple choice)

answers.body: Maintaining relations with a customer - after finishing the project, so we have a change of cooperating in the future;
Paid service, maintaining project after it’s already done and working, monitoring issues and fixing bugs;
Maintaining a project - offering client to implement new functionalities to the project to make it last;
Maintenance is period of 3 months after project ended, that Netguru is responsible to support Client for free in case of any issues with the service provided;
Maintaining relations with a customer - after finishing the project, so we have a change of cooperating in the future;

Maintenance is period of 3 months after project ended, that Netguru is responsible to support Client for free in case of any issues with the service provided;
To provide leads to the Sales team, reach out to customers before BD Representatives
To provide tech support, process knowledge and present our products/services
To prepare contract with all of the technical requirements needed by a Customer

published_attributes.title: What is the role of the pre-sales team?

answers.body: To provide leads to the Sales team, reach out to customers before BD Representatives
To provide tech support, process knowledge and present our products/services
To prepare contract with all of the technical requirements needed by a Customer

draft_attributes.title: What is the role of the pre-sales team?

answers.body: Try customer to go with a different technology
Keep customer’s contact - maybe in the future there will be a project we can work on
Ask Mateusz Czajka or Rafał Gawilk (as Tech specialists) for approval of an “exotic” technology
